title: Romeo & Juliet In Rwanda
description: How do you change someone's behavior? Most of us would point to education or persuasion. But what if the answer lies elsewhere? This week, we revisit a 2018 story about human nature and behavior change — a story that will take us on a journey from Budapest to the hills of Rwanda.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
